reasoning: The plan needs to be structured to first identify the core components of the 'Orchestral-SpeedCore track with lyrics about Fizz La Metta' goal. This involves extracting Task Agnostic Steps (TAS) from the high-level goal. Once the TAS are identified, they need to be assigned to the appropriate roles. The plan will then detail the execution of these TAS, considering dependencies and the specific contributions of each team member. Finally, the plan will outline the orchestration of these steps to achieve the final output.
